entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 7 this morning then rising. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this morning. Temperature falling to minus 7 this morning then rising. Wind chill minus 10 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
